attributes.action: Paypal's User Agreements, Do not agree with 180 day refund on restricted accounts think this is unfair pratice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have a paypal account which has been restricted. Paypal have not removed the restriction and Now advised me that i can't remove my money from their account until 180 days. That means they will earn 180 days interest on my money, while i don't get none. I find this totally unfair and if knowning this was a user agreement then i would never have used them for payments.
I am from what i can see many other people are finding the same problem!
Paypal your user agreements are not fair for people! Please Help support my petition!

rejection.details: We suggest you contact Consumer Direct http://www.consumerdirect.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
